name: Lucias
subtitle: Saint of Blessings
description: The High Priest of Lua and Frey's senior. Lucias's faith is strong enough to call forth Lua's blessing. Items blessed by him bear the power of Light and becomes effective weapons against demons.
story: Lucias was a member of Lua's Holy Knights before awakening as the Saint of Blessings. Under the command of the Living Legend, Ricardo, he protected Orvel and neighboring towns from Demons. However, stigmata started to appear on his body when he was 19, and by the call of Lua, the holy knight became the Saint of Blessings. His mission is to travel around the world and bring the light of Lua to those in need. He stayed true to his duties, wandering the world to share blessings. Now, he holds a weapon in his hand again to defeat the power of darkness that has been growing in strength over the past 100 years.
like: Dishes made with apple, fishing, prayer, helping people, mysterious magic shows and performances.
dislike: Rude ones, undelivered promises, taking human life lightly.

inn.idle: This place... I can feel the power of light as well as the flow of harmony.

recruit.greet: A warm greeting to you. I hope you're having a blessed day.
talk: There was a wedding ceremony nearby. Ahhh, it was such a divine sight.
Did you see Brother Baudouin? I heard he was quite drunk yesterday...
I can feel all sorts of powers here. It feels like the center of the world...

affinity.greet: It's a pleasure to have you back. Join me in saying grace before the meal.
talk: You wonder if there are Saints other than me, you say? Hmm, I haven't met them, but yes, there are three more.
I used to be a flag bearer when I was a Holy Knight. Who would have thought my halidom as a Saint would be a flag as well? Hahaha.
affinity.gift: It is so generous of you to give me a gift, but I must say it's more than I deserve. If I run into someone in need, may I give this to them?

relationship.greet: May the blessings of the Lua be with you.
talk: Oh, Stardust is here. They used to visit my hometown at least once a year when I was young. Well, should we go and see if Esker is still around?
Sometimes my memories fail me. My past, and the memories of previous Saints of Blessings tend to mix...
Holy Knight, Saint... My title does not change what I must do. I simply work to help those struggling with pain and agony.

uw.story: A blessed flag representing the Sun, Moon, and the entire sky. It contains the power and teachings of the Creator, Lua. The power of light spreads when he waves the flag, bringing peace to his allies' minds, defeating the powers of darkness. A halidom bestowed upon Lucias, who used to be a flag bearer in Lua's Holy Knights.

ut.story: The bible of infinity that a line of Sages of Blessings used to record their works. The title of a sage is passed down with the memories of its predecessor, so it would seem that there is no reason for them to write anything down. However, the danger of the accumulated memories erasing the identity of the present sage made writing this bible necessary.

ut.story: Lucias had a cherished friend back when he was young. This friend was a member of a troupe named Stardust. He had very nimble hands despite his young age and used to pickpocket countless wallets from gamblers. However, Stardust would only visit Lucias's town once a year, and so the two friends gave each other something they treasured to remember their friendship. This dice is the special trick dice made by Lucias's friend, Esker.

ut.story: The holy sword that Lucias used when he was under Ricardo's command as a Holy Knight. High priests of Lua blessed it directly, imbuing it with strong holy energy. Lucia was later chosen as the Saint of Blessings, and his blessings are actually much more powerful than the blessing invested in the sword. He always carries the sword to remember his days as the Holy Knight, but he never draws it. Gossipers say that it is because he fears he would not look like a saint if he is to be seen wielding a sword...
